com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory

Class LocationRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractRequestFactory
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.LocationRequestFactory

  • @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
public final class LocationRequestFactory
extends AbstractRequestFactory
    Factory to build requests to interact with the Location related web service endpoints.

    • Method Detail

      • buildGetAppLocationsListRequest

        @NonNull
public AbstractRequest buildGetAppLocationsListRequest(long appId,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      android.location.Location location)
        Parameters:
        appId - the ID of the App on the web service.
        location - the location of the user. Used to sort the returned locations by distance.
        Returns:
        the list of locations associated with the app.

      • buildGetLocationDetailsRequest

        @NonNull
public AbstractRequest buildGetLocationDetailsRequest(long locationWebServiceId)
        Parameters:
        locationWebServiceId - the ID of the Location on the web service.
        Returns:
        an AbstractRequest that represents a request to the web service to get the details of the Location with the ID passed.

      • buildGetLocationImageRequest

        @NonNull
public AbstractRequest buildGetLocationImageRequest(@NonNull
                                                   android.content.Context context,
                                                   long locationWebServiceId)
        Parameters:
        context - the Application context.
        locationWebServiceId - the web service ID of the Location to get the image for.
        Returns:
        an AbstractRequest that represents a request to the web service to get the image for a Location with the web service ID passed.
